description: This file defines a coordinated team of AI agents for researching topics across platforms like HackerNews, web search, and articles. It includes class definitions, agent configurations, and execution logic for the team-based research process.

classes.name: Article
classes.description: A data model representing an article with title, summary, and reference links.

methods.name: main execution block
methods.description: Runs the team response asynchronously to generate an article about top HackerNews stories.
